listitem.para:
Write a web front-end (Servlet/JSP files) for your enterprise bean. You may want to follow the following steps:
Write an HTML file with a form for the 2 entry fields of the adder. On submit it should request the servlet which process the HTTP service request.
Write the servlet which extracts the two parameters and calls the EJB. It could pass the result onto a JSP which generates the response view.
Write a application deployment descriptor,
Add the following steps to the Ant build file:
A target for compiling the servlet.
A target for generating the jar file in the required structure.
A target for creating an enterprise archive which contains
the jar file for the enterprise bean,
the war (web archive) file for the web components and
the application.xml deployment descriptor for the enterprise archive.
Test the servlet.
